1370: Blankard was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1370.
Got married to Marisseis at age 22 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Marisseis, Itsburgis, at age 22.
1373: Had a son with Marisseis, Erenboede, at age 25.
1374: Had a daughter with Marisseis, Oda, at age 26.
1375: Had a daughter with Marisseis, Marisseis, at age 27.
1376: Had a daughter with Marisseis, Cofte, at age 28.
1377: Had a daughter with Marisseis, Clementia, at age 29.
1378: Had a daughter with Marisseis, Nannen, at age 30.
1380: Lost daughter Marisseis when Marisseis was 6 years old.
1382: Had a son with Marisseis, Remboldus, at age 34.
1384: Had a daughter with Marisseis, bertrade, at age 36.
1386: Had a daughter with Marisseis, Linnea, at age 38.
Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 11 years old.
1389: Lost daughter bertrade when bertrade was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1392: Had a son with Marisseis, Raso, at age 44.
1393: Lost son Raso when Raso was 2 years old.
